Data Pipeline Connectors

Connect to multiple data sources with our powerful data pipeline. Transform raw data into structured content ready for AI processing.

Start Free Trial View Documentation

Unified Data Collection & Processing

AiWDC's data pipeline connectors provide a unified interface for collecting content from diverse sources. Our intelligent extraction and transformation layer ensures clean, structured data ready for AI processing.

50+
Supported Data Sources
99.9%
Data Accuracy
24/7
Automated Collection

Comprehensive Connector Types

RSS Feed Connectors

Monitor blogs, news sites, and content platforms with real-time RSS feed processing.

  • Real-time feed monitoring
  • Content filtering and categorization
  • Duplicate detection and removal
  • Schedule-based collection
  • Feed validation and error handling

Technical Specifications

Formats: RSS 2.0, Atom 1.0, JSON Feed
Frequency: 5 minutes to 24 hours
Limits: 1000 feeds per account

Web Scraping Connectors

Extract content from websites using intelligent scraping algorithms that respect robots.txt and rate limits.

  • Intelligent content extraction
  • JavaScript rendering support
  • Anti-bot detection bypass
  • Scheduled crawling
  • Content change detection

Technical Specifications

Methods: CSS selectors, XPath, ML extraction
Rendering: Headless Chrome, Puppeteer
Compliance: robots.txt, rate limiting

Database Connectors

Connect directly to SQL and NoSQL databases to extract structured data and content.

  • SQL and NoSQL support
  • Custom query builder
  • Incremental data extraction
  • Data transformation pipeline
  • Real-time synchronization

Technical Specifications

SQL: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server
NoSQL: MongoDB, Redis, Elasticsearch
Security: SSL/TLS, connection pooling

API Connectors

Integrate with REST APIs, GraphQL endpoints, and webhooks to pull data from external services.

  • REST and GraphQL support
  • Authentication handling
  • Rate limiting and pagination
  • Webhook endpoints
  • Custom data mapping

Technical Specifications

Auth: OAuth2, API keys, JWT, Basic Auth
Formats: JSON, XML, CSV, custom
Rate Limits: Configurable per endpoint

Search Engine Connectors

Monitor trending topics and search results from Google, Bing, and other search engines.

  • Trending topic monitoring
  • Keyword ranking tracking
  • Competitor analysis
  • News and blog results
  • Sentiment analysis integration

Technical Specifications

Engines: Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo
Features: SERP tracking, trends API
Updates: Real-time to hourly

Social Media Connectors

Collect content and engagement data from social media platforms and community forums.

  • Platform API integration
  • Content aggregation
  • Engagement metrics tracking
  • Trend and hashtag monitoring
  • Community sentiment analysis

Technical Specifications

Platforms: Twitter, Reddit, LinkedIn
Data Types: Posts, comments, metrics
Compliance: Platform API terms

Advanced Data Processing Features

Intelligent Content Extraction

Our AI-powered extraction algorithms identify and extract the main content from web pages, removing ads, navigation, and irrelevant elements.

AI-powered content identification and cleaning

Data Transformation Pipeline

Transform raw data into structured content using our powerful transformation engine with custom rules and AI assistance.

Custom rules and AI-powered transformation

Real-time Processing

Process data in real-time with our streaming pipeline, ensuring immediate availability for AI content generation.

Streaming pipeline with immediate processing

Quality Assurance

Automated quality checks ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency before processing.

Automated accuracy and consistency checks

Error Handling & Recovery

Robust error handling with automatic retry mechanisms and detailed logging for troubleshooting.

Automatic retry and detailed logging

Scheduling & Automation

Flexible scheduling options with cron-like expressions and event-based triggers.

Flexible scheduling with event-based triggers
